title: Shower
desc:
Post 1741
- From now on, at the start of each round, a random player will draw a ðŸŒŠ card.
- This effect may stack with itself if multiple instances of (1741) Shower are played, but the removal condition will remove every instance at once.
 - If it does stack, the cards that these (1741) Showers draw will be distributed to any random player, with a chance for the same player to be chosen multiple times.
 - The shower will end when anyone plays any card with the <:inferno:1118594776716021780> color.
